text.div:
ObservationReliability

Codes that provide an estimate of the degree to which quality issues have impacted on the value of an observation

This value set has an inline code system http://hl7.org/fhir/observation-reliability, which defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
ok OKThe result has no reliability concerns
ongoing Measurement OngoingAn early estimate of value; measurement is still occurring
early EarlyAn early estimate of value; processing is still occurring
questionable QuestionableThe observation value should be treated with care
calibrating CalibratingThe result has been generated while calibration is occurring
error Error OccurredThe observation could not be completed because of an error
unknown Reliability UnknownNo observation reliability value was available

name: ObservationReliability
description: Codes that provide an estimate of the degree to which quality issues have impacted on the value of an observation

concept.definition: The result has no reliability concerns
An early estimate of value; measurement is still occurring
An early estimate of value; processing is still occurring
The observation value should be treated with care
The result has been generated while calibration is occurring
The observation could not be completed because of an error
No observation  reliability value was available
